meanings.sent1: The old book had raggedier pages than the new one.
meanings.sent2: The torn paper was even raggedier than I had expected.
meanings.sent3: The map with raggedier edges made it look like a treasure map.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded raggedier than the scratchy record playing in the background.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range looked even raggedier under the setting sun.

meanings.sent1: The beggar wore raggedier clothes than anyone else on the street.
meanings.sent2: After playing in the mud, his clothes were even raggedier than before.
meanings.sent3: The costume party required everyone to dress in raggedier outfits.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a raggedier version of Cinderella in her torn dress.
meanings.sent5: The scarecrow's outfit looked even raggedier in the morning light.
